content.question: Which of the following best describes the structure of the passage?

choices.label: The description of a trip leads to a broad generalization about travel.
A number of distinct incidents combine to form a coherent whole.
A sequential account of an activity sheds light on an individual’s character.
A conflict between two characters leads to a revelation about friendship.

content.answer: A sequential account of an activity sheds light on an individual’s character.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe how plot orders events in a narrative.
